channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pavement Hole, 1st October
item.description:
Hole in pavement from work, not filled in. Close to entrance to Tram Station on Avenue Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Avenue Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bags of dog mess, 1st October
item.description:
There are several bags of dog mess thrown behind and to the side of the post box. This has been reported before and although the message came through that it had been resolved, the bags are still there.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Club Gardens Road, Hayes, London

item.title: Flytipping, 1st October
item.description:
Flytipping next to the bin of 1-12 lilian close, and people on neighbouring streets have come and dumped their whole bins in our bin, so it is already full one day after collection. This happens every week
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lilian Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Full size tent pitched overnight . pathway blocked by fishermans chords, 1st October
item.description:
On the south side of lake fishermen have had the audacity to attach chords from their illegal full size four berth tent across a tarmac footway to the edge of the lake used for public viewing of the lake . the tent has been illegally in position overnight .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): East Rochester Way, Blendon, London
